title: Vision of the New Temple (Part 1)
summary: Summary for Ezekiel 40. This chapter contains prophetic visions, symbolic acts, and messages of judgment and restoration delivered by the prophet Ezekiel.

faq.question: What is the main theme of Ezekiel 40?
faq.answer: It reveals God's sovereignty, judgment, and promise of restoration.

faq.question: What stands out in Ezekiel 40?
faq.answer: Symbolic visions, powerful imagery, and God's call to repentance and holiness.
